title: LFT Support/Top lane main
body:
Wanting to join a ranked team, who will consistently play and be committed to play and practice as a team. available for most of the week after 3pm.
Current rank: Gold 3
Previous rank: Plat 5
Champ pool: Most tanky tops and some ap tops/Naut, Thresh, Annie, Morg and Janna are my best supports but I can play all supports
